name: seek
content:
seek verb
(SEARCH)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 [ T ] to try to find or get something, especially something that is not a physical object: "Are you actively seeking jobs?" she asked. Hundreds of dissidents are seeking refuge/asylum in the US embassy. Synonyms
hunt (SEARCH)
look (SEARCH)
search
B2 [ T ] to ask for advice, help, approval, permission, etc.: Legal advice should be sought before you take any further action.
More examplesFewer examplesI was expelled from school and forced to seek work.You should seek compensation.If symptoms persist seek medical attention .Contributions are being sought for the disaster fund.He had actively sought a pardon from the president.
